Vendido. Sold. Gone.

To get a higher resolution image (from the Edge browser), right click on the image and hit "Open image in new tab." That'll take you to the hosted image, and you can either magnify or download.

Bert Daniels Recruit PSA 3 – sold

Shipping is included. Let me know if you have any questions.
